      • currentUserHasRoleByCode

        protected boolean currentUserHasRoleByCode(java.lang.String code)
                                    throws UnauthorizedAccessException,
                                           ResourceNotFoundException
        Check whether the user has the necessary rights.
        Parameters:
        code - the role code.
        Returns:
        true if current user has role by code, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedAccessException - if user is anonymous.
        ResourceNotFoundException - if role code not exist.
